description: I am a student at Semarang State Polytechnic, majoring in Electrical Engineering with a focus on the D3 Electronics program, currently holding a GPA of 3.5. I demonstrate strong capabilities in both team and individual work, exhibit discipline and responsibility in my tasks, and possess a quick learning ability for new concepts. I am communicative and have a keen interest in exploring various fields, particularly in PLC, PPID, Process Engineering, and Research and Development

Graduated from Vocational High School majoring in Computer and Network Engineering (TKJ). Gained foundational knowledge in computer systems, network configuration, basic programming, and IT troubleshooting. Developed a strong technical base and discipline that supported further study in electronics engineering.
